markdownRemark.excerpt: I’m not a systems programmer. Before 2018, I had written a grand total of maybe 200 lines of C code for a short university class. All the program did was…
markdownRemark.html: I’m not a systems programmer. Before 2018, I had written a grand total of maybe 200 lines of C code for a short university class. All the program did was compute the Z pattern-matching algorithm over a string. No nuanced syscalls, no complex multi-compilation unit build processes, the worst was getting a segfault when I did something wrong.

frontmatter.title: My First Zig Project
frontmatter.description: I rewrote a C project in Zig and you wouldn't imagine what happened next.

frontmatter.title: I Want Simple, Not Just Easy
